remarks.note: The Windows Event Log, exposed through the class, supports only Event IDs within the range of unsigned 16 bit integers. Implementors must take care to properly truncate the Event ID before writing it to the Windows Event Log.

Log.param: The of the message to be logged.
The numeric identifier for the event.
The to log, including its stack trace. Pass to not log an exception.

LogFormat.param: A String containing zero or more format items.
An Object array containing zero or more objects to format.
